Text:

shows the actual airing dates of this greta show ! Why is that ? And now 2 new episodes aired within one week ? Usually there are only 1 new episode used to air ( 2 parts in 1 episode ) in one week. What's happening ?

It's a bluray rip.
Thanks to both ettv and MrUnpopular.
It's the same series that's airing on History channel?
